author: alec
name: AutoAvatar
install_msg:
**Thanks for installing!**

Despite the same, keep in mind this cog does not automatically run the `newavatar` command, so you'll need to use a cog like FIFO (https://github.com/bobloy/Fox-V3/tree/master/fifo)
description: Chooses a random bot avatar from a preset list or can optionally scrape we heart it.
